short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow to accessing to your favorites websites more faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thanks to woopy, improve your productivity thanks to shortened domain names!
The list of avaible URLs are avaible here: https://woopy.alexiis.fr/websites.json

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Woopy makes it faster and easier for internet users to access the sites they want.
This extension allows to change the method to save your website URLs. To see if a website is compatible, click on the Woopy icon on the extensions tab. Now you can write one of "new URLs" avaible and access to a website easily.

Woopy detects custom URLs to redirect you to a correct URL. Yes, it is that easy.
